thread.title: Paul Ockenden
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Paul Ockenden

author: Paul Ockenden
title: Paul Ockenden
text: I recently had the misfortune of having an accident while I was in Dubai and I needed to contact Fast Cover while I was in hospital Every person I spoke to was so understanding and had real empathy for my situation. I was guided on how to make sure my claim would be approved and given great advice on what to do and where to go for care. The claims process has been smooth and the follow up by Fast Cover has been fantastic. I have recently taken out coverage with them again for my trip to Bali. I wouldn't use anyone else now, and neither will my family. Thankyou!
